name: <ops::index_range::IndexRange as iter::traits::iterator::Iterator>::advance_by

ops::index_range::IndexRange::take_prefi.doc:
Removes the first `n` items from this range, returning them as an `IndexRange`.
 If there are fewer than `n`, then the whole range is returned and
 `self` is left empty.

 This is designed to help implement `Iterator::advance_by`.

num::nonzero::NonZero::<T>::new.doc: Creates a non-zero if the given value is not zero.
